Title: Reds' Joey Votto wants to get back 'to being dangerous'
Description: Joey Votto is determined to be a power hitter again. “I want to get back to being dangerous,” Votto said Monday from the Cincinnati Reds' spring training complex in Goodyear, Arizona. Besides, guys who crush the ball into the seats and punctuate it with a bat flip are just more fun to watch,
Author: St. Louis Post-Dispatch
